One starry night, Mia discovered a shimmering object nestled in her backyard. Curiosity piqued, she approached and found a small, green alien with big, glistening eyes. The alien, named Zorp, was lost and needed help to repair his spaceship. Mia, fascinated and eager for adventure, gathered tools from her dadâ€™s shed. As they worked together, Zorp shared stories of distant galaxies and bizarre creatures. With a final twist of a wrench, the ship roared to life. Zorp invited Mia aboard for a quick trip around the Earth. They soared through the sky, forging an unbreakable bond before Zorp vanished into the stars.
